name: I Wanna Be a Narwhal
description:
I Wanna Be A Narwhal

You want to be a Narwhal. Unfortunately, you are a comet (which is an inferior life form). Go become a Narwhal by stealing all of the stars in the night sky! Dont ask why this works.

Left arrow - button1

Right arrow - button2

Credits

ZahranW - programming - art - audio - design

KingW - level design

Made in fusion 2.5 by Clickteam

Made in a week for the 2 buttons jam 2019

Note: If you are having frame rate issues, try the Direct3D8 version, save data should carry over
